verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard בֶּן־ <WH1121> son שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> And when Saul's כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֵ֤ת <WH4191> was dead אַבְנֵר֙ <WH74> that Abner בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> in Hebron וַיִּרְפּ֖וּ <WH7503> were feeble יָדָ֑יו <WH3027> his hands וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and all the Israelites נִבְהָֽלוּ׃ <WH926> were troubled

וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> two אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> men שָׂרֵֽי־ <WH8269> [that were] captains גְדוּדִ֣ים <WH1416> of bands הָי֪וּ <WH1961> had בֶן־ <WH1121> son שָׁא֟וּל <WH7586> And Saul's שֵׁם֩ <WH8034> the name הָאֶחָ֨ד <WH259> of the one בַּֽעֲנָ֜ה <WH1196> [was] Baanah וְשֵׁ֧ם <WH8034> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֣י <WH8145> of the other רֵכָ֗ב <WH7394> Rechab בְּנֵ֛י <WH1121> the sons רִמּ֥וֹן <WH7417> of Rimmon הַבְּאֶֽרֹתִ֖י <WH886> a Beerothite מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin כִּ֚י <WH3588> for גַּם־ <WH1571> is also בְּאֵר֔וֹת <WH881> (for Beeroth תֵּחָשֵׁ֖ב <WH2803> also was reckoned עַל־ <WH5921> of בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> to Benjamin

וַיִּבְרְח֥וּ <WH1272> fled הַבְּאֵרֹתִ֖ים <WH886> And the Beerothites גִּתָּ֑יְמָה <WH1664> to Gittaim וַֽיִּהְיוּ־ <WH1961> been שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there גָּרִ֔ים <WH1481> and were sojourners עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> age הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

וְלִיהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <WH3083> And Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> son שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> Saul's בֵּ֖ן <WH1121> had a son נְכֵ֣ה <WH5223> [that was] lame רַגְלָ֑יִם <WH7272> of [his] feet בֶּן־ <WH1121> old חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> He was five שָׁנִ֣ים <WH8141> years הָיָ֡ה <WH1961> happened בְּבֹ֣א <WH935> came שְׁמֻעַת֩ <WH8052> when the tidings שָׁא֨וּל <WH7586> of Saul וִיהֽוֹנָתָ֜ן <WH3083> and Jonathan מִֽיִּזְרְעֶ֗אל <WH3157> out of Jezreel וַתִּשָּׂאֵ֤הוּ <WH5375> took him up אֹֽמַנְתּוֹ֙ <WH539> and his nurse וַתָּנֹ֔ס <WH5127> and fled וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> happened בְּחָפְזָ֥הּ <WH2648> and it came to pass as she made haste לָנ֛וּס <WH5127> to flee וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> that he fell וַיִּפָּסֵ֖חַ <WH6452> and became lame וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> And his name מְפִיבֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH4648> [was] Mephibosheth

וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> departed בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the sons רִמּ֤וֹן <WH7417> of Rimmon הַבְּאֵֽרֹתִי֙ <WH886> the Beerothite רֵכָ֣ב <WH7394> Rechab וּבַעֲנָ֔ה <WH1196> and Baanah וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and came כְּחֹ֣ם <WH2527> about the heat הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> of the day אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> to the house אִ֣ישׁ בֹּ֑שֶׁת <WH378> of Ishbosheth וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he שֹׁכֵ֔ב <WH7901> who lay אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH4904> on a bed הַֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> at noon

וְ֠הֵנָּה <WH2007> in בָּ֜אוּ <WH935> And they came thither עַד־ <WH5704> against תּ֤וֹךְ <WH8432> into the midst הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the house לֹקְחֵ֣י <WH3947> [as though] they would have fetched חִטִּ֔ים <WH2406> wheat וַיַּכֻּ֖הוּ <WH5221> and they smote אֶל־ <WH413> in הַחֹ֑מֶשׁ <WH2570> him under the fifth וְרֵכָ֛ב <WH7394> [rib] and Rechab וּבַעֲנָ֥ה <WH1196> and Baanah אָחִ֖יו <WH251> his brother נִמְלָֽטוּ׃ <WH4422> escaped

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> For when they came הַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> into the house וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> he שֹׁכֵ֤ב <WH7901> he lay עַל־ <WH5921> on מִטָּתוֹ֙ <WH4296> on his bed בַּחֲדַ֣ר <WH2315> chamber מִשְׁכָּב֔וֹ <WH4904> bed וַיַּכֻּ֙הוּ֙ <WH5221> and they smote וַיְמִתֻ֔הוּ <WH4191> him and slew וַיָּסִ֖ירוּ <WH5493> him and beheaded אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> his head וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> him and took אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> his head וַיֵּֽלְכ֛וּ <WH1980> and traveled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> through הָעֲרָבָ֖ה <WH6160> the plain כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> all night

וַ֠יָּבִאוּ <WH935> And they brought אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> the head אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֥שֶׁת <WH378> of Ishbosheth אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִד֮ <WH1732> unto David חֶבְרוֹן֒ <WH2275> to Hebron וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> Behold רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> Behold the head אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֗שֶׁת <WH378> of Ishbosheth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> of Saul אֹֽיִבְךָ֔ <WH341> thine enemy אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בִּקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> which sought אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH5315> thy life וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> hath יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> and the LORD לַֽאדֹנִ֨י <WH113> my lord הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> the king נְקָמוֹת֙ <WH5360> avenged הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this מִשָּׁא֖וּל <WH7586> of Saul וּמִזַּרְעֽוֹ׃ <WH2233> and of his seed ס

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> רֵכָ֣ב ׀ <WH7394> Rechab וְאֶת־ <WH853> בַּעֲנָ֣ה <WH1196> and Baanah אָחִ֗יו <WH251> his brother בְּנֵ֛י <WH1121> the sons רִמּ֥וֹן <WH7417> of Rimmon הַבְּאֵֽרֹתִ֖י <WH886> the Beerothite וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֑ם חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> unto them [As] the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who פָּדָ֥ה <WH6299> who hath redeemed אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> my soul מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> out of all adversity

כִּ֣י <WH3588> when הַמַּגִּיד֩ <WH5046> When one told לִ֨י לֵאמֹ֜ר <WH559> me saying הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold מֵ֣ת <WH4191> is dead שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Behold Saul וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> he הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become כִמְבַשֵּׂר֙ <WH1319> good tidings בְּעֵינָ֔יו <WH5869> thinking to have brought וָאֹחֲזָ֣ה <WH270> I took hold ב֔וֹ וָאֶהְרְגֵ֖הוּ <WH2026> of him and slew בְּצִֽקְלָ֑ג <WH6860> him in Ziklag אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לְתִתִּי־ <WH5414> who [thought] that I would have given ל֖וֹ בְּשֹׂרָֽה׃ <WH1309> him a reward for his tidings

אַ֞ף <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> person רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> How much more when wicked הָרְג֧וּ <WH2026> have slain אֶת־ <WH853> אִישׁ־ <WH376> man צַדִּ֛יק <WH6662> a righteous בְּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> in his own house עַל־ <WH5921> on מִשְׁכָּב֑וֹ <WH4904> his bed וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not אֲבַקֵּ֤שׁ <WH1245> require אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמוֹ֙ <WH1818> his blood מִיֶּדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> of your hand וּבִעַרְתִּ֥י <WH1197> and take you away אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> common

וַיְצַו֩ <WH6680> commanded דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּעָרִ֜ים <WH5288> his young men וַיַּהַרְג֗וּם <WH2026> and they slew וַֽיְקַצְּצ֤וּ <WH7112> them and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶם֙ <WH3027> their hands וְאֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> and their feet וַיִּתְל֥וּ <WH8518> and hanged [them] up עַל־ <WH5921> beside הַבְּרֵכָ֖ה <WH1295> over the pool בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> in Hebron וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> רֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> the head אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH378> of Ishbosheth לָקָ֔חוּ <WH3947> But they took וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <WH6912> and buried בְקֶֽבֶר־ <WH6913> [it] in the sepulchre אַבְנֵ֖ר <WH74> of Abner בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> in Hebron פ
